lines.text: He wanted to make it look like he was level 2, right? This is a fake <c=#0000FF>Flesh to Stone.</c>
Gives credibility to the idea that his buddy was trying to use <c=#FF6000>Emergency Exit,</c> even though he couldn't.
Makes sense- but you're still not gettin' to exactly why they wanted to do that in the first place.
What's the point of this trick?
